attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Complaints there is no one to arbitrate between yourself and the vet.

There should be a vet ombudsman.

Vets should be made answerable and accountable.

Pricing

Vets fees should be standardised across the country and more affordable.50% less

A written statement of costs at 1st treatment inc aftercare until recovered. Price agreed by both parties at this time.

A consultation fee (if charged)inc

Diagnose in a pre-determined format. X-Ray-shows any abnormalities to organs inside the body.Blood test for other irregularities. These two tests when done should be the basis on how to treat the animal.

RCVS says veterinary surgeons use professional judgement in how diagnosis takes place.

EG we'll try this and if it does'nt work come back next week. £100-£200+

Next week try this £100-£200+

Finally take an X-Ray and blood and suddenly problem found.

Either op/put sleep costs.

Not much change from a £1000+
If tests done first less suffering for the animal and less money for the vet.

If animal put to sleep due to Vets delay no fees should be payable.
